compliance_assessment.framework_description: General Data Protection Regulation - A regulation in EU law on data protection and privacy.

requirements.requirement: Obtain explicit consent from users before processing their personal data.
requirements.evidence: No evidence of consent mechanisms in place.
gaps: Lack of user consent management system
recommendations: Implement a consent management system to track user consent.

requirements.requirement: Ensure data subjects have the right to access their data.
gaps: Access request process not clearly defined
recommendations: Develop a clear process for users to request access to their data.

requirements.requirement: Implement data protection by design and by default.
requirements.evidence: Some data protection measures are in place.
gaps: Insufficient documentation of data protection measures
recommendations: Document and enhance data protection measures in the development lifecycle.

critical_gaps: Lack of user consent management system
Insufficient documentation of data protection measures
remediation_plan: Define and document the access request process.
Enhance documentation of data protection measures.
